text:
1. Page Title: The Weight of Fear

2. Panels:

   - Panel 1 — Setup: Young man hesitates on the stairs, sweating.  
     Dialogue/Thoughts:  
       • Young Man: "I can't face her trivial gossip."  
       • Young Man: "Better to sneak out unseen."  

   - Panel 2 — Setup: Outside, he looks troubled under the heat.  
     Dialogue/Thoughts:  
       • Young Man: "Why am I scared of this?"  
       • Young Man: "Is it a fantasy or reality?"  

3. Layout: vertical strip

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The young man grapples with his fears and insecurities while navigating a suffocating urban environment.
